column2: "Nna Temannyi Elifaz buaa dɛ
column4: "Aso nyimpa bi botum edzi mu wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim anaa? Hwɛ
column6: odzi mu wɔ narankasa n’enyi do."

column2: "Ana ɔyɛ enyigye bi ma Otumfo no
column3: dɛ ɔwo etsen? Anaadɛ ɔyɛ mfaso ma no
column4: dɛ ɔwo ema w’akwan dzi mu?"

column2: "Ana wo suro a isuro no ntsi na ɔka w’enyim
column3: Na ɔdze wo kɔ atsɛmbu mu yi?"

column2: "Ana wo ndzeyɛbɔn nnyɛ kɛse dodow? Na nkyii so w’emumuyɛ nnyi ewiei?"
"Na ɔwo agye wo nua hɔ ahobadze kwa
column3: Na apepa adagyafo hɔn atam."

column2: "Ɔwo amma abahatɔfo nsu ma wɔannom
column3: Na ɔwo akam nyia ɔkɔm dze no n’edziban."

column2: "Ɔyɛ wo dɛ nyimpa a ɔwɔ tum; Na enyimnyam no na obenya asetsena pa."
"Ɔwo na egya mbaa ekunafo kwan ma wɔdze nsapan kɔ
column3: Na ngyanka so ahyɛ hɔn abagura."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na mfir abɔ wo ho aprɔw
column3: Na awerɛfir suro rehaw wo yi."

column2: "Ana ɔwo nnhu sum
column3: Na nsu piigyan a ɔkata wo do no?"

column2: "Ana nnyɛ sor no krɔn mu na Nyankopɔn wɔ
column3: Na ofi hɔ hu nworaba a ɔwɔ sorsor no etsifi."

column2: "Na ɔwo ese dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze na Nyankopɔn nyim? Ana obotum ehu sum kebii mu asɛm ebu ho atsɛn?"

column2: "Mununkum kusuww no yɛ akataho ma no
column3: na onnhu adze; Na ɔnantsew wɔ sor no kɔntɔnkrɔn mu."

column2: "Ana ebɛfa tsetse kwan no do Dza nyimpa bɔn anantsew do no?"
"Hɔn a wohwiim hɔn kɔree ansaana hɔn ber rudu Na wohuee hɔn fapem gui dɛ esutsen no:"
"Hɔn a wɔsee Nyankopɔn dɛ
column3: Fi hɛn do kɔ; Na
column4: Ebɛnadze na Otumfo no botum ayɛ ama hɛn no?"

column2: "Naaso ɔdze ndzepa hyehyɛɛ hɔn efiefi amaama: Mbom emi dze
column3: mennkɛnye ndzebɔnyɛfo afa apam koraa."

column2: "Atseneneefo no hu
column3: na hɔn enyi gye; Na hɔn a wodzi bem no sereserew hɔn."

column2: "Dɛ
column3: ampaara hɔn a wɔsoɛree tsiaa hɛn no woetwitwa hɔn egu
column4: Na hɔn mu nkaa no gya no ahyew."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: afei fa woho bɔ Nyankopɔn ho ɛ
column4: na wo ho ntɔ wo: Ɔnam iyi do na adzepa bɛba ama wo."

column2: "Meserɛ wo
column3: gye n’anomu mbra no
column4: Na fa ne nsɛm sie w’akoma mu."

column2: "Sɛ ɔwo esan kɔ Otumfo no nkyɛn a
column3: ɔdze wo besi hɔ; Sɛ nkyɛ ibeyi emumuyɛ efi w’asesee mu akɔ ekyirkyiikyir a."

column2: "Na fa w’egyapadze gu huntuma mu
column3: Na wo sika mapa so gu ɔwora mu mbosaabo mu;"

column2: "Na Otumfo no bɛyɛ w’egyapadze
column3: Na dwetɛ a wɔahoa ho ama wo."

column2: "Na ɔno na wo ho bɛsɛpɛw wo wɔ Otumfo no ho
column3: Na ama w’enyi do akyerɛ Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Ɔwo bɔbɔ wo mpaa ama no
column3: na obetsie wo; Na ɔwo etua w’anohobadze."

column2: "Eso ɔwo ebɔbɔ adze bi ho tsirmpɔw
column3: na ɔbɛyɛ hɔ ama wo; Na ekan bɛhyerɛn w’akwan do."

column2: "Na sɛ Nyankopɔn brɛ wo adze a
column3: nna ɔno ahomado ntsi a Osiandɛ nyia ɔbrɛ noho adze no

column2: "Sɛ nyia onndzi bem no mpo ɔgye no a: Nna ɔno
column3: ɔnam w’ahotsewee do ɔbɛgye wo."
